1.0.0.name: connect20/saaslink_soc
1.0.0.description: A Magento extension designed to enhance product page linking with prominent social networks. By adding meta tags, social networks can recognise and process product-related information from Magento frontend product pages. This feature enables users to effectively share and promote product information on various social networks.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
